item.title: The RedBlackTech FREE Giveaway
item.description: The Prize 🎁 Value on Amazon: $46.26 with 4.8⭐ Distributed systems is a blazing hot topic right now, especially with the advent of AI Large Language Models and of Blockchain. This book will substantially advance your knowledge of distributed systems, how to break them, how to work with them, and which databases to use for which reasons. …Who cares? This book is useful to a few kinds of people: 📈 Those who want to get into a big-data related career, such as data or machine learning engineering 👨‍💻 Those who have a technical interview coming up with a FAANG (MANGA) company, and will be tested on system design 🛠️ Those looking to become better software engineers in general Official Rules How to Enter 🔎 Subscribe before the selection datetime of March 2nd, 2024 @ 12pm EST (YouTube, TikTok) 💬 Comment on the promotional video before said time Restrictions ⚠️ You must be 13 years or older ⚠️ You must be in the United States (sorry for this restriction - but being my first giveaway, I’m not comfortable with the logistics yet) Winner Selection Selection Time 🕛 March 2nd, 2024 @ 12pm EST
